definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A static cultivation apparatus for the culture in vitro of Plasmodium falciparum gametocytes is described.
sentences.chinese: 应用自制恒温恒气装置静态培养恶性疟原虫配子体。

sentences.english: It was believed that segregation distortion usually arose with gametic selection genes or sterility genes.
sentences.chinese: 多数偏分离位点存在配子体选择基因或育性相关基因。

sentences.english: Gonads are aggregations of developing gametes.
The male gametophytes of conifers and angiosperms are the POLLEN grains .
sentences.chinese: 松柏类植物以及被子植物的雄配子体即花粉粒。

sentences.english: Double fertilization is the type of the Premitotic syngamy .
sentences.chinese: 双受精过程属有丝分裂前配子融合类型。

sentences.english: In general, the transmission ratios of gametes with 6R were decreased clearly.
sentences.chinese: 带有6R的配子传递率普遍显著下降。

sentences.english: The male gamete could not unite with the female .
sentences.chinese: 雄配子不能与雌配子结合。

sentences.english: The male gamete could not unite with the female .
sentences.chinese: 雄配子不能与雌配子结合。

sentences.english: The female sterile clone 28 is aborted because of the failure development in the female gametophyte.
sentences.chinese: 油松28号不育系是因雌配子体发育停滞所致。

sentences.english: And union of unreduced gametes is the most important mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 其中，不减数配子是多倍体形成的主要机制。

sentences.english: The term also describes the development of an unfertilized female gamete into the sporophyte , a phenomenon described as PARTHENOGENESIS.
sentences.chinese: 也用来描述未受精的雌配子发育为孢子的现象。

sentences.english: Apospory, aposporous The development of a gametophyte directly from a sporophyte without the occurrence of meiosis or spore formation.
sentences.chinese: 不经过减数分裂形成孢子，而直接形成配子体。

sentences.english: The term also describes the development of an unfertilized female gamete into the sporophyte, a phenomenon described as PARTHENOGENESIS. See apospory; apomixis.
sentences.chinese: 也用来描述未受精的雌配子发育为孢子的现象。

sentences.english: Such similar-appearing gametes are called isogametes.
sentences.chinese: 这种外形相似的配子称为同形配子。

sentences.english: Such similar-appearing gametes are called isogametes.
sentences.chinese: 这种外形相似的配子称为同形配子。

sentences.english: In these groups, gametes are produced by mitosis.
sentences.chinese: 在这些种类中，配子是由有丝分裂形成的。

definition: allele (one of two paired gene in diploid organism)
